dublinCore.dc:title: HR 6190 ENR: Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2010, Part III
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Eleventh Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Tuesday, the fifth day of January, two thousand and ten
form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the funding and expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund, to amend title 49, United States Code, to extend the airport improvement program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2010, Part III.

section.header: Extension of taxes funding Airport and Airway Trust Fund

subsection.text: Subparagraph (B) of section 4081(d)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking September 30, 2010 and inserting December 31, 2010.

paragraph.text: Clause (ii) of section 4261(j)(1)(A) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking September 30, 2010 and inserting December 31, 2010.
Clause (ii) of section 4271(d)(1)(A) of such Code is amended by striking September 30, 2010 and inserting December 31, 2010.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect on October 1, 2010.

section.header: Extension of Airport and Airway Trust Fund expenditure authority

subsection.text: Paragraph (1) of section 9502(d) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking October 1, 2010 and inserting January 1, 2011; and
by inserting or the Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2010, Part III before the semicolon at the end of subparagraph (A).

subsection.text: Paragraph (2) of section 9502(e) of such Code is amended by striking October 1, 2010 and inserting January 1, 2011.
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on October 1, 2010.

paragraph.text: Section 48103 of title 49, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking and at the end of paragraph (6);
by striking the period at the end of paragraph (7) and inserting ; and; and
by inserting after paragraph (7) the following:

paragraph.text: $925,000,000 for the 3-month period beginning on October 1, 2010.

Subject to limitations specified in advance in appropriation Acts, sums made available pursuant to the amendment made by paragraph (1) may be obligated at any time through September 30, 2011, and shall remain available until expended.

subsection.text: Section 47104(c) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2010, and inserting December 31, 2010,.
Section 40117(l)(7) of title 49, United States Code, is amended by striking October 1, 2010. and inserting January 1, 2011..
Section 41743(e)(2) of such title is amended by striking 2010 and inserting 2011.
Section 44302(f)(1) of such title is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking September 30, 2010, and inserting December 31, 2010,; and
by striking December 31, 2010, and inserting March 31, 2011,.

subsection.text: Section 44303(b) of such title is amended by striking December 31, 2010, and inserting March 31, 2011,.
Section 47107(s)(3) of such title is amended by striking October 1, 2010. and inserting January 1, 2011..
Section 47115(j) of such title is amended by inserting and for the portion of fiscal year 2011 ending before January 1, 2011, after 2010,.
Section 47141(f) of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2010. and inserting December 31, 2010..
Section 49108 of such title is amended by striking September 30, 2010, and inserting December 31, 2010,.

Section 161 of the Vision 100—Century of Aviation Reauthorization Act (49 U.S.C. 47109 note) is amended by inserting , or in the portion of fiscal year 2011 ending before January 1, 2011, after fiscal year 2009 or 2010.
Section 186(d) of such Act (117 Stat. 2518) is amended by inserting and for the portion of fiscal year 2011 ending before January 1, 2011, after October 1, 2010,.
Section 409(d) of such Act (49 U.S.C. 41731 note) is amended by striking September 30, 2010. and inserting September 30, 2011..
The amendments made by this section shall take effect on October 1, 2010.

section.text: Effective as of August 1, 2010, and as if included therein as enacted, the Airline Safety and Federal Aviation Administration Extension Act of 2010 (Public Law 111–216) is amended as follows:

paragraph.text: In section 202(a) (124 Stat. 2351) by inserting of title 49, United States Code, before is amended.
In section 202(b) (124 Stat. 2351) by inserting of such title before is amended.
In section 203(c)(1) (124 Stat. 2356) by inserting of such title before (as redesignated.
In section 203(c)(2) (124 Stat. 2357) by inserting of such title before (as redesignated.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
